Pd: como efecto secundario me agarro diabetes y sobrepeso, ahora no puedo salir de mi cuarto.

NA “Near Airport” is known as the fastest region to arrive at the Airport. Since they gave up on the S-Tier Events, they are investing in Speedruns. In particular they are current world record holders in Airport Any % and Airport No Wins.

Ótimo jogo para usar Hacks e hostilizar seus oponentes que jogam limpo. Espero um dia que a VALVE de um fim nos hacks.

Игра очень хорошая, детали, звуки, всё выполнено круто-чётко, Рекомендую всем!
It is a good game I give 2 thumbs up.

I only recommend this game if You are a chill player. I mean You are not a toxic or etc. When You play solo then find new keyboard and mouse because You will destroy your setup, but if You are gonna play with friends just for fun that will be very funny game for You. You will enjoy it ;)

TA GRA TO NIE TYLKO GRA, TA GRA TO ŻYCIE, ODMIENIŁA POGLĄD NA ŚWIAT MOIMI OCZAMI
首先这个游戏外挂实在太多了  300个小时举报了几十个，没有一个处理。其次csgo部分玩家的嘴巴是真的一言难尽,虽然说国内大多数游戏多多都存在这样的人，但是对比pubg和cod，喷子多太多，不建议佛系玩家入坑。

Am I still going to play this game? : Yes

Am I having fun? : No

Why don't I just stop? : IDK
